thread.title: Maroon 5 have reportedly had 'extensive talks' to headline Super Bowl 2016 Halftime Show
thread.title_full: Maroon 5 have reportedly had 'extensive talks' to headline Super Bowl 2016 Halftime Show

title: Maroon 5 have reportedly had 'extensive talks' to headline Super Bowl 2016 Halftime Show
text:
Thursday, Oct 22 2015, 08:48   Google+ Maroon 5 may be heading to the Super Bowl next year.According to E! News , the Adam Levine-led band are the current frontrunners to play the Super Bowl Halftime Show after having "extensive talks" with organisers. 
© Facebook / Maroon 5 Other acts that have been rumoured to play the next show include Coldplay and Bruno Mars, who last played in 2014.It was alleged last month that Mars had been invited back to "curate" the show , being joined by a series of guests.Last year's Super Bowl was headlined by Katy Perry, and featured guest spots from Missy Elliott and Lenny Kravitz - and who can forget Left Shark ? 
© Getty Images / Christopher Polk Katy Perry at Super Bowl: Internet's funniest responses to half-time show Perry's performance drew 118.5 million viewers , the highest viewing figure in the show's history.Super Bowl 50 will take place on Sunday February 7, 2016 at Levi's Stadium, Santa Clara in California.Watch the video for Maroon 5's 'This Summer's Gonna Hurt Like a Motherf**ker' below:
